replies.body:
Well, well, well, PeachyYas decided to retire after all...

Ever since I was promoted to Junior Moderator, I was inspired by your hard-work and compassion towards others users. Now that you're gone, I don't know who to look for when I need help the most  

On behalf of the Senior Staff and the Moderating team, we thank you for all your efforts into making this community even better :)
replies.body_tagged:

Ever since I was promoted to Junior Moderator, I was inspired by your hard-work and compassion towards others users. Now that you're gone, I don't know who to look for when I need help the most  

On behalf of the Senior Staff and the Moderating team, we thank you for all your efforts into making this community even better :)

replies.body: Peachy, I've really appreciated all the help that you offered myself and the other upcoming staff members. I hope that you've enjoyed your time, and best of luck in the future!
